import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { isNavbarOpen = false; toggleNavbar() { this.isNavbarOpen = !this.isNavbarOpen; } closeNavbar() { this.isNavbarOpen = false; } }
